comment: /**  * Configure resolvers for custom controller method arguments.  * @param resolver the resolver(s) to add  */
code: /**  * Configure resolvers for custom controller method arguments.  * @param resolver the resolver(s) to add  */ public void addCustomResolver(HandlerMethodArgumentResolver... resolver) {     Assert.notNull(resolver, "'resolvers' must not be null").     this.customResolvers.addAll(Arrays.asList(resolver)). }
